name: GLKBaseEffect
desc: A simple lighting and shading system for use in shader-based OpenGL rendering.

items.name: var label: String?
items.desc: A string used to name your effect.

items.name: var transform: GLKEffectPropertyTransform
items.desc: The modelview, projection and texture transformations applied to the vertex data when the effect is bound.

items.name: var lightingType: GLKLightingType
items.desc: The strategy the effect uses to calculate light values at each fragment. See GLKLightingType.

items.name: var lightModelTwoSided: GLboolean
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether lighting is calculated for both sides of a primitive.

items.name: var material: GLKEffectPropertyMaterial
items.desc: The material properties used when calculating the light values for a rendered primitive.

items.name: var lightModelAmbientColor: GLKVector4
items.desc: The ambient color applied to all primitives rendered by the effect.

items.name: var light0: GLKEffectPropertyLight
items.desc: The lighting properties for the first light in the scene.

items.name: var light1: GLKEffectPropertyLight
items.desc: The lighting properties for the second light in the scene.

items.name: var light2: GLKEffectPropertyLight
items.desc: The lighting properties for the third light in the scene.

items.name: var texture2d0: GLKEffectPropertyTexture
items.desc: The properties for the first texture.

items.name: var texture2d1: GLKEffectPropertyTexture
items.desc: The properties for the second texture.

items.name: var textureOrder: [GLKEffectPropertyTexture]?
items.desc: The order in which textures are applied to rendered primitives.

items.name: var fog: GLKEffectPropertyFog
items.desc: The fog properties to apply to the scene.

items.name: var colorMaterialEnabled: GLboolean
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether or not to use the color vertex attribute when calculating the lightâ€™s interaction with the material.

items.name: var useConstantColor: GLboolean
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether or not to use the constant color.

items.name: var constantColor: GLKVector4
items.desc: A constant color, used when per-vertex color data is not provided.
